reviewText: Pretty good film!!!  I liked it because it was filmed in our town so i got to see a lot of familiar places & several people were in it from our hometown.  Also the Weaver story was a hoot as my maiden name was Weaver.  I enjoyed it :)
A real thriller! The special effects are wonderful. You won't be disappointed with this film. Do not watch it alone!

Plat was well thought out
Story line flowed nicely
I had fun watching the movie
Over all a good movie to watch
